user_query: I want to get the latest odds and matches available on Betmaster for football, basketball, and tennis, along with win rates statistics of different teams and players.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest odds and matches data for football, basketball, and tennis on Betmaster.
Retrieve win rates statistics for different teams and players in football, basketball, and tennis.
Combine the odds and matches data with the win rates statistics for a comprehensive overview.
